vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the installation of playground equipment, playground surfacing, American Disabilities Act (ADA) accessible ramp, ADA parking, striping and signs, and an independent safety audit at Marcus Park located at 3003 Northaven Road through Omnia Cooperative Purchasing Agreement with Kompan, Inc. - Not to exceed $184,370.58 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
